members.name: textValueChanged
members.comment: Invoked when the value of the text has changed. The code written for this method performs the operations that need to occur when text changes.

name: java.awt.event.TextListener
comment: The listener interface for receiving text events. The class that is interested in processing a text event implements this interface. The object created with that class is then registered with a component using the component's addTextListener method. When the component's text changes, the listener object's textValueChanged method is invoked.
